created_by: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
name: System Scripts Autorun Keys Modification
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ss].*/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt][Uu][Pp].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Hh][Uu][Tt][Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Ff][Ff].*/)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\System\\Scripts* AND registry.path:(*\\Startup* OR *\\Shutdown* OR *\\Logon* OR *\\Logoff*)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:\(Empty\))))`
